metadata.name: PUMA Pass #1
metadata.description:
The PUMA Pass is your access to exclusive Black Station product drops and experiences.

In advance of Black Station product launches, PUMA Pass holders will receive Token NFTs that allow them to purchase extremely limited and innovative products being sold at BlackStation.PUMA.com.

Holders can choose to sell those Tokens if they wish. They will still receive the next Token drop.

PUMA Pass holders will also receive access to future PUMA projects in the web3 and metaverse space.
